text: Gilawala railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Gilawala village, Lodhran district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Line 1 { 1905 } Category:Railway stations in Lodhran District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Gilawala railway station
